name: Watch Your Back (itch)
description:
Hello everyone!

The game is recently updated (11.06.22) and soon there will also be a devlog on YT.
This is/will be a little game created for Alternative Engine Jam 2.
This is my second project on itch.io and second game jam I have ever took part of. The game is made on UPBGE.

Controls:
-Mouse to look
-Left button to shoot
-WASD to move

For now it at least does follow the jam theme - Blind Spot. Enemies are always spawning in the darkness behind you.
Now I have added health, shooting and enemy attack mechanics. As well as some many visual updates and menus, sounds and few other things.
